fields.label: Items
fields.description: List of items this pricing logic applies to

fields.label: Item Group
fields.description: If not individual items, you can apply logic to an entire item group

fields.label: Value
fields.description: The pricing value, can be discount percentage or price per unit

fields.label: Start Date
fields.description: The date when this pricing logic starts to apply

fields.label: End Date
fields.description: The date when this pricing logic ends (optional)

fields.label: Priority
fields.description: Priority of this pricing logic, lower number means higher priority

fields.label: Description
fields.description: A detailed description of the pricing logic

fields.label: Active
fields.description: Indicates whether the pricing logic is active
